name: Sentinel Services Group, LLC
about: Sentinel Services Group, LLC is a veteran-owned company dedicated to providing high-quality flight training and aviation services. With a team of experienced employees, we prioritize safety and affordability, making flying accessible to everyone. Our mission is to promote aviation through competitive fuel pricing, support airport development, and offer comprehensive services including flight training, aircraft maintenance, and part sales. We are open 7 days a week to accommodate flexible schedules and offer introductory flights for new learners. At Sentinel, our focus is on teaching you how to fly, not just obtaining a license, using modernized aircraft and unique training methods. We are committed to helping you achieve your flying dreams with safety as our top priority.
services:
